  • Method Details

    • createMenuItem

      void createMenuItem​(MenuItem item)
      Creates and adds a new MenuItem.
      Parameters:
      item - the new item to be added.
      Precondition:
      item != null.
      Invariant:
      isWellFormed().

    • createMenuItem

      void createMenuItem​(java.lang.String name)
      Creates and adds a new composite Product.
      Parameters:
      name - the new composite product to be added to menu.
      Precondition:
      name != null.
      Invariant:
      isWellFormed().

    • addItemToComponent

      void addItemToComponent​(java.lang.String compositeItem, java.lang.String name)
      Adds a Base product to the an existing composite Product.
      Parameters:
      compositeItem - name of the composite product.
      name - the name of the base product.
      Precondition:
      compositeItem != null && name != null., menuItems.get(name) != null && menuItems.get(compositeItem ) != null.
      Postcondition:
      ((CompositeProduct)menuItems.get(compositeItem )).contains(menuItems.get(name)).

    • removeItemFromComponent

      void removeItemFromComponent​(java.lang.String baseName, java.lang.String componentName)
      Removes a base product from a composite product.
      Parameters:
      baseName - the base product that will be removed.
      componentName - the name of the component.
      Precondition:
      assert baseName != null && componentName != null.
      Postcondition:
      (( CompositeProduct)menuItems.get(componentName)).contains(menuItems.get(baseName)).

    • editMenuItem

      void editMenuItem​(BaseProduct item, float price)
      Edit the price of a base product.
      Parameters:
      item - name of the base product.
      price - the new price of the item.
      Precondition:
      item != null && price <=-1 .
      Invariant:
      isWellFormed().

    • editMenuItem

      void editMenuItem​(CompositeProduct item, java.lang.String name)
      Edit the name of a composite product.
      Parameters:
      item - name of the composite product.
      name - the new name of the item.
      Precondition:
      assert item != null && name != null .
      Invariant:
      isWellFormed().

    • deleteMenuItem

      void deleteMenuItem​(java.lang.String nameItem)
      Deletes a menu item from the list.
      Parameters:
      nameItem - name of the item to be deleted.
      Precondition:
      name != null.
      Invariant:
      isWellFormed().

    • createOrder

      void createOrder​(java.util.Date date)
      Creates an order,and add it to a order list ,and create create a map for order who will be populated with MenuItem.
      Parameters:
      date - date when the client order.
      Precondition:
      date != null.

    • addOrderItem

      void addOrderItem​(int orderID, java.lang.String menuItem)
      Adds item to a order with orderID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - is id of the order.
      menuItem - name of the item which will be added to the order.
      Precondition:
      menuItems.get(menuItem) != null && orderID >=0 && orderID < orders.size().

    • computeOrderPrice

      float computeOrderPrice​(int orderID)
      Computes the price for the order with the orderID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - is id of the order.
      Returns:
      price of the order.
      Precondition:
      orderID >=0 && orderID < orders.size() && menuItems.get(menuItem) != null.

    • generateBill

      void generateBill​(int orderID) throws java.io.IOException
      Generates a txt bill of the order with orderID.
      Parameters:
      orderID - is id of the order.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
      Precondition:
      orderID >=0 && orderID < orders.size().

    • isWellFormed

      boolean isWellFormed()
      Metoda testează dacă structura meniului rămâne bine formată, adică fiecare element de meniu este stocat în hashmap ca o pereche String
      Returns:
      true dacă clasa este bine formată
